exercises.name: Exercise 1: Single Key Familiarization
exercises.description: Focus on pressing each home row key individually to build muscle memory.
exercises.tasks: A A A A A↵S S S S S↵D D D D D↵F F F F F

exercises.name: Exercise 2: Pair Combinations
exercises.description: Practice combinations of two keys to build finger coordination.
exercises.tasks: AS AS AS↵SD SD SD↵DF DF DF↵AD AD AD↵AF AF AF↵SF SF SF

exercises.name: Exercise 3: Trio Combinations
exercises.description: Introduce sequences of three keys for a slightly more challenging task.
exercises.tasks: ASD ASD ASD↵SDF SDF SDF↵ADS ADS ADS↵ADF ADF ADF↵SAF SAF SAF↵DAS DAS DAS

exercises.name: Exercise 4: Full Left Hand Combinations
exercises.description: Practice sequences that require coordination of all fingers on the left hand.
exercises.tasks: ASDF ASDF ASDF↵FDSA FDSA FDSA↵ADSF ADSF ADSF↵SAFD SAFD SAFD↵SDAF SDAF SDAF↵FDAS FDAS FDAS
